reviewText: She was happy with this show and all the discs was in great shape so I give this an A+ rating and if I had this purchase to do over again I would!
Excellent
I want the rest of the seasons. Where r they?
Season Two came out in 2008.  Will the rest come out before or after we, the fan base, have shuffled off this mortal coil?  COME ON ALREADY!!!
This set is not priced appropriately... bottom line....
Great great great great would buy this again best deal out there and worked perfect bright colors and great just
These are wonderful.  Just as great as I remember when seeing them before on tv.  Please bring the rest of the seasons to dvd.  We have been waiting a long time to see the rest on dvd!  Thank you!

Watching the first 2 seasons of this great series makes me wish for more!  I know that all of the Dallas seasons have been released on DVD.  It's high time that Knots Landing is paid the same attention!
I loved the series way back in the day... I enjoyed catching up on the old series. Enjoyed all of them!
First two seasons were as great as I had remembered. Wish they would put out the rest. Thanks for the memories.
This was a gift for a friend. As of a few days ago she had not watched any of the shows. However, although I cannot speak for the content, the packaging was most impressive.
V ery good
Excellent!
Loved this show. Glad I got the DVDs, Now if only they will release the rest of the show.
Loved it.
Only place over ever going official Knots Landing DVDs... Only wish they made more seasons for sale, as they make great gifts for my mom
Wish it could stream!!!!!!!!!!1
Love it!
Love me some more Knots Landing please continue distribution on the rest of the seasons. Where are they?
A very good way to remember the GOOD OLD DAYS!!!
Great series!  Now all we need are the rest of the series.  Discs worked perfectly.  No problems.  Warner Bros.  needs to step up.
